item.title: 关税豁免后苹果股价领涨科技股
item.description: 美国对主要从中国进口的智能手机、电脑和其他一些电子产品免征关税后，苹果公司的股价在法兰克福上涨超过 6%。【原文：Apple's shares rose over 6% in Frankfurt after the U.S. granted exclusions from tariffs on smartphones, computers and some other electronics imported largely from China.】

item.title: 花旗集团因关税担忧下调美国股票评级至 "中性
item.description: 花旗集团将其对美国股票的评级从 "增持 "下调至 "中性"，称预计唐纳德-特朗普总统的全面关税将影响该地区的盈利增长。【原文：Citigroup downgraded its stance on U.S. equities to "neutral" from "overweight", saying it expects President Donald Trump's sweeping tariffs to impact earnings growth in the region.】

item.title: 印尼官员表示，印尼将主动增加美国进口以帮助贸易谈判
item.description: 印尼首席经济部长秘书周一表示，印尼将购买价值180亿至190亿美元的美国商品，以寻求就美国计划征收的关税进行谈判。【原文：Indonesia will offer to buy U.S. goods worth $18 billion to $19 billion as it seeks negotiations over planned U.S. tariffs, the secretary to the chief economic minister said on Monday.】

item.title: 回到俄罗斯天然气？警惕特朗普的欧盟面临能源安全困境
item.description: 在俄罗斯入侵乌克兰三年多之后，欧洲的能源安全依然脆弱。企业担心，对美国的依赖已成为另一个弱点。【原文：More than three years after Russia's invasion of Ukraine, Europe's energy security is fragile. Businesses are wary that reliance on the United States has become another vulnerability.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，意大利富豪成为长江和记港口的主要投资者
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一援引知情人士的话报道，意大利亿万富翁詹路易吉-阿庞特（Gianluigi Aponte）的家族企业正在成为一个集团的主要投资者，该集团正寻求从企业集团长江和记手中收购 43 个港口。【原文：Italian billionaire Gianluigi Aponte's family-run business is emerging as the lead investor of a group seeking to buy 43 ports from conglomerate CK Hutchison , Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 高盛将 2025 年底金价预期上调至 3700 美元/盎司
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）将 2025 年底的金价预期从每盎司 3,300 美元上调至 3,700 美元，预计区间为 3,650 美元至 3,950 美元，理由是各国央行的需求强于预期，以及经济衰退风险导致交易所交易基金流入增加。【原文：Goldman Sachs raised its end-2025 gold price forecast to $3,700 per ounce from $3,300, with a projected range of $3,650-$3,950, citing stronger-than-expected demand from central banks and higher exchange-traded fund inflows due to recession risks.】

item.title: Holcim 计划于 6 月分拆北美业务
item.description: 瑞士建筑材料公司 Holcim 周一表示，分拆北美业务的计划将于 6 月进行，但须在 5 月 14 日的年度股东大会上获得股东批准。【原文：The planned spin-off of Holcim's North American business should take place in June, subject to the approval of shareholders at its May 14 annual general meeting, the Swiss building materials company said on Monday.】

item.title: 瑞士山德士公司在美国对安进公司提起反垄断诉讼
item.description: 瑞士仿制药生产商山德士公司（Sandoz）周一表示，它已在美国提起反垄断诉讼，控告安进公司巩固其大片药物恩贝拉（etanercept）的市场支配地位。【原文：Swiss generic drug manufacturer Sandoz said on Monday it had filed an antitrust lawsuit in the U.S. against Amgen for entrenching the dominant market position of its blockbuster medicine, Enbrel (etanercept).】

item.title: 澳大利亚 Clorox 公司因谎称使用回收塑料被罚款 520 万美元
item.description: 澳大利亚竞争监管机构周一称，高乐氏公司在当地的分公司因谎称其 GLAD 厨房和垃圾袋部分由回收的海洋塑料制成而被联邦法院处以 825 万澳元（519 万美元）的罚款。【原文：Australia's competition regulator said on Monday Clorox's local unit had been fined A$8.25 million ($5.19 million) by the Federal Court over falsely claiming its GLAD kitchen and garbage bags were partially made from recycled ocean plastic.】

item.title: KKR 任命大卫-彼得雷乌斯为中东业务主席
item.description: 美国私募股权公司 KKR 周一表示，已任命大卫-彼得雷乌斯（David Petraeus）为其中东业务主席，并在该地区成立了一个由朱利安-巴拉特-杜（Julian Barratt-Due）领导的投资团队。【原文：U.S. private equity firm KKR on Monday said it has appointed David Petraeus as the chairman of its middle east business, and has set up an investment team in the region under the leadership of Julian Barratt-Due.】

item.title: 台积电第一季度利润可能飙升，但特朗普政策给前景蒙上阴影
item.description: 台积电（TSMC）是全球人工智能应用领域先进芯片的主要生产商，该公司将于本周四公布第一季度利润增长 54% 的报告，但同时也可能会指出美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易政策所带来的风险。【原文：TSMC , the main global producer of advanced chips used in artificial intelligence applications, is set to report a 54% leap in first-quarter profit on Thursday, though is also likely to flag risk from trade policies of U.S. President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 中国 3 月出口因关税前抢购而大幅增长，但贸易战前景黯淡
item.description: 由于中美贸易战不断升级，有可能大幅抑制世界第二大经济体的增长，在美国最新关税生效前，中国工厂匆忙出货，3月份出口增长超出预期。【原文：China's export growth beat expectations in March after factories rushed out shipments before the latest U.S. tariffs took effect, as an escalating Sino-U.S. trade war threatens to sharply restrain growth in the world's second-largest economy.】

item.title: 日本央行上田警告美国关税政策将加剧不确定性
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫周一表示，由于美国的关税政策，全球和国内经济的不确定性急剧增加。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda said on Monday global and domestic economic uncertainty has increased sharply due to U.S. tariff policy.】

item.title: 台湾科技供应链股在特朗普关税豁免后反弹
item.description: 周一，在美国政府批准对主要从中国进口的智能手机、电脑和其他一些电子产品暂时免征高额关税后，作为苹果等公司主要供应商的台湾科技公司股票上涨。【原文：Stocks in Taiwanese tech companies that are major suppliers to companies like Apple rose on Monday after the U.S. government granted temporary exclusions from steep tariffs on smartphones, computers and some other electronics imported largely from China.】

item.title: 高盛预计 2026 年油价将下跌
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）预计，由于经济衰退的风险上升以及欧佩克+集团的供应增加，油价将在今年年底和明年出现下跌。【原文：Goldman Sachs expects oil prices to decline through the end of this year and next year because of the rising risk of a recession and higher supply from the OPEC+ group.】

item.title: 特朗普加倍努力将美国钢铁控制权牢牢掌握在美国手中
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周日表示，他不认为一家外国公司应该控制美国钢铁公司（U.S. Steel），并重复了上周的言论，这使日本新日铁公司（Nippon Steel）以 140 亿美元收购美国钢铁公司的希望破灭。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Sunday said he doesn't think a foreign company should control U.S. Steel , repeating comments made last week that dimmed hopes for a greenlight of a $14 billion bid by Japan's Nippon Steel to buy the U.S. firm.】

item.title: Bally's 董事长称，澳大利亚赌场集团火速出售星际酒店后，Bally's 对星际酒店展开猛烈收购
item.description: 美国博彩公司 Bally's Corp 董事长 Soo Kim 告诉路透社记者，该公司曾考虑等 Star Entertainment 公司自愿进入破产管理后再进行投资，但担心这家澳大利亚赌场集团难以拯救。【原文：Bally's Corp considered waiting for Star Entertainment to enter voluntary administration before investing but feared the Australian casino group would have been too hard to rescue, the U.S gaming firm's chairman, Soo Kim, told Reuters.】

item.title: 特朗普称将在下周宣布征收半导体关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周日表示，他将在下周宣布进口半导体的关税税率，并补充说将对该行业的一些公司采取灵活措施。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Sunday said he would be announcing the tariff rate on imported semiconductors over the next week, adding that there would be flexibility on some companies in the sector.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税后，印度虾业陷入困境
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普征收关税引发的动荡可能会动摇全球运往美国的虾，最大供应商印度的出口商称，这将危及2000个装有冷冻美食的集装箱。【原文：Turbulence unleashed by President Donald Trump's tariffs could rock global shipments of shrimp to the United States, with exporters in biggest supplier India saying they endanger 2,000 containers packed with the frozen delicacy.】

item.title: 受挫美元企稳，但投资者为更多关税波动做好准备
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税计划对全球市场造成了冲击，投资者对世界储备货币的信心受到动摇，美元在周一稍稍站稳了脚跟，但仍接近三年来的低点。【原文：The U.S. dollar found some footing on Monday but was still near a three-year low after a bruising week that shook investor faith in the world's reserve currency as U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff plans whipsawed global markets.】

item.title: 中美贸易战影响全球经济增长前景，油价持平
item.description: 周一早盘，油价持平，原因是市场担心中美贸易战升级将削弱全球经济增长并抑制燃料需求。【原文：Oil prices were flat in early trade on Monday on concerns the escalating trade war between the United States and China would weaken global economic growth and dent fuel demand.】

item.title: 日本日经指数走高，iPhone 相关股票跳涨
item.description: 美国政府批准对主要从中国进口的智能手机和其他电子产品免征高额关税后，与 iPhone 相关的股票跳涨，日本日经平均股价周一早盘走高。【原文：Japan's Nikkei share average traded higher early on Monday as iPhone-related shares jumped after the U.S. administration granted exclusions from steep tariffs on smartphones and other electronics imported largely from China.】

item.title: 关税发生变化，华尔街期货谨慎收涨
item.description: 白宫豁免美国对智能手机和电脑征收 "对等 "关税后，华尔街股票期货周一在亚洲反弹，但涨幅有限，因为唐纳德-特朗普总统警告说，美国仍有可能在某个时候征收关税。【原文：Wall Street share futures rallied in Asia on Monday after the White House exempted smartphones and computers from "reciprocal" U.S. tariffs, though gains were limited as President Donald Trump warned levies were still likely at some point.】

item.title: 特朗普称在国家安全关税调查中关注电子供应链
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周日在 "真理社交网站"（Truth Social）上发布消息称，他的政府正在对半导体和电子供应链进行调查，作为即将开展的国家安全关税调查的一部分。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump posted on Truth Social on Sunday that his administration is looking at semiconductors and the electronics supply chain as part of upcoming national security tariff investigations.】

item.title: 桥水公司的雷-达里奥（Ray Dalio）说，特朗普的贸易战使美国 "接近衰退
item.description: 全球最大对冲基金之一的亿万富翁创始人雷-达里奥（Ray Dalio）周日表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易战已使美国濒临衰退。【原文：Ray Dalio, billionaire founder of one of the world's largest hedge funds, said on Sunday that President Donald Trump's trade war has brought the United States near to recession.】

item.title: 卢特尼克称，特朗普计划在贸易战中对豁免电子产品单独征税
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）周日表示，智能手机、电脑和其他一些电子产品刚刚被免除了从中国进口的高额关税，它们将在未来两个月内与半导体产品一起面临单独的新关税。【原文：U.S. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said on Sunday that smartphones, computers and some other electronics, just exempted from steep tariffs on imports from China, would face separate new duties along with semiconductors within the next two months.】

item.title: 美国商务部长称豁免电子产品将被单独征收关税
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）周日在接受美国广播公司（ABC）"本周 "节目采访时表示，智能手机、电脑和其他一些电子产品将被单独征收关税，半导体也可能在一个月左右被征收关税。【原文：U.S. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said on Sunday in an interview with ABC's "This Week" that smartphones, computers and some other electronics will come under separate tariffs, along with semiconductors that may be imposed in a month or so.】

item.title: 报道称，韩国浦项制铁考虑加入现代钢铁公司在美国投资 58 亿美元的钢铁厂项目
item.description: 周日的新闻报道称，韩国钢铁制造商浦项制铁正在考虑加入现代钢铁公司在路易斯安那州建造一座价值58亿美元工厂的项目，因为该国钢铁行业正试图应对美国对该行业征收的关税。【原文：South Korean steelmaker POSCO is considering joining a project by Hyundai Steel to build a $5.8 billion plant in Louisiana as the country's steel industry tries to respond to U.S. tariffs on the sector, news reports said on Sunday.】

item.title: 英国表示，任何美英贸易协定都不会放松食品标准
item.description: 英国商业大臣乔纳森-雷诺兹（Jonathan Reynolds）周日表示，英国不会放松食品安全标准，作为任何降低对美出口关税协议的一部分。【原文：Britain will not relax its food safety standards as part of any deal to secure lower tariffs on its exports to the United States, business minister Jonathan Reynolds said on Sunday.】

item.title: 中国如何从讨好特朗普到 "绝不屈服 "关税挑衅
item.description: 对于试图避免贸易战升级的中国政府来说，这种好斗的态度标志着一个艰难的转折。【原文：The combative approach marked a hard turn for Beijing, which had tried to avoid a spiraling trade war.】
